A shitshow of Hilarity and True Comedy Gold.

How it Works: You can spawn as a Bad Shit sent in to place a bomb/Protect the Good Guys from Rescuing Hostages. The Good Guys also Come in to Do the Opposite (defuse the bomb or safely escort the hostages).

Well, you always pay for your weapons, and well that's it.
